name: SINISTROID (Inferior Planet)
description:
Trapped without jump drive in a pirate-infested sector of space, your ship is out-of-control: its designers only gave it one maneuvering thruster, so all it can do is turn left.

Fortunately, the pirate craft exhibit the same design flaw - but be warned. Some of their spaceships turn right instead!

"SINISTROID" was originally created as a submission to the 2020 GMTK Game Jam. The jam version can be found here! 

This newer version includes several UI and environmental improvements, plus a second playable ship class. I intend to keep updating it for a while, I have some more ideas on where to take it.

Instructions

Press any key to turn left. Except 1 and 2, which handle ship selection in the menu, and Escape - that one quits the game.
